title: Katherine Schweit: "Stop The Killing"
description: Michael speaks with retired FBI agent Katherine Schweit about her book "Stop the Killing: How to End the Mass Shooting Crisis." Original air date 9 June 2022. The book was published on 15 August 2021.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Michael Smerconish, Katherine Schweit)
